title: Are there good Parker Pens that are under 500 rupees? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would like to recommend two Parker pens under 500 rupees which are worth mentioning. These are from a functional point of view: Parker Jotter. I am a pen enthusiast . I you want to get in Collection of pens, I recommend you to use this pen. It is a cheap , 200 rupees pen and is durable. It has an easily available Parker ballpoint refill and writes really well. It is excellent for school exams. It is easily available on Amazon and Flipkart. Moreover, it gives brand value as well in a well finished writing instrument. Parker frontier ball pen . If you are not a pen enthusiast, do not buy this pen . You are likely to scratch its grip. But if you are one, go and grab it. It still shows durability to a lot of extent, as it is made up of solid stainless steel. They're, however, difficult to come by these days. I managed to buy one, and according to me, is worth a try.
